SEARCH
Package com.data.gui

Class CoinDataSceneController

java.lang.Object
com.data.gui.CoinDataSceneController
public class CoinDataSceneController extends Object
Controller class for the Coin Data Scene in a JavaFX application. This class manages the user interface for displaying cryptocurrency market data.

  • Method Details

    • loadData

      public void loadData()
      Loads and displays market data into the scene based on user-defined parameters. It fetches data using MarketDataCache and updates UI components accordingly.

    • getBack

      public void getBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action to return to the previous scene. It clears cache for previously searched market.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the user action.
      Throws:
      IOException - if loading the FXML resource fails.

    • convertTimestampToDate

      public static String convertTimestampToDate(long timestamp)
      Converts a UNIX timestamp to a formatted date string.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The UNIX timestamp to convert.
      Returns:
      A formatted date string.

    • chartCreate

      public void chartCreate(int days)
      Creates a chart for displaying market data over a specified number of days.
      Parameters:
      days - The number of days to include in the chart.

    • logout

      public void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action to log out of the application.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the user action.
      Throws:
      IOException - if loading the FXML resource fails.

    • close

      public void close(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

    • refreshData

      public void refreshData(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Refreshes the displayed market data. Reloads all data for e.g. prices, charts etc...
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the user action.
